Equipment Actions.Action 1: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 6 Slashing

Other Actions.Action 1: Charm, The Incubus targets one humanoid and attempts to magically charm them.  The charmed target loves to obey the Incubus' commands, unless they would result in the target's death
Other Actions.Action 2: Draining Kiss, The Incubus kisses one creature it has charmed, dealing an Average 32 Psychic damage, and reduces the creature's maximum HP
Other Actions.Action 3: Etherealness, The Incubus enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane or vice versa

Abilities.Ability 1: Telepathic Bond, The Incubus can telepathically communicate with a creature it has charmed, regardless of the distance or if they are even on the same plane of existance
Abilities.Ability 2: Shapechanger, The Incubus can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form

Damage Resistances.Damage 5: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks
